mapper.select:
select ni.id, ni.user_id, ni.user_code, ni.content, ni.del_flag, ni.create_date, ni.name, si.code as staffCode, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ei.name as enterpriseName, ei.images as enterpriseImages, di.dept_name, poi.name as positionName from notify_info ni left join staff_info si on (si.id = ni.staff_id) left join enterprise_info ei on (ei.id = si.enterprise_id) left join dept_info di on (di.id = si.dept_id) left join position_info poi on (poi.id = si.position_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{notifyInfo.userName},'%')
AND ni.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{notifyInfo.content},'%')
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{notifyInfo.staffName},'%')
AND si.user_id = #{notifyInfo.staffId}
AND ei.user_id = #{notifyInfo.enterpriseId}
order by ni.create_date desc

select ni.id, ni.user_id, ni.user_code, ni.content, ni.del_flag, ni.create_date, ni.name, si.code as staffCode, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages from notify_info ni left join staff_info si on (si.id = ni.staff_id) where 1 = 1 AND si.user_id = #{userId} AND ni.del_flag = '0' order by ni.create_date desc
